text: Vanokubvunza maererano nekurwa mumwedzi inoyera (1st, 7th, 11th uye 12th yepa karenda yeIslaam). Iti: “Kurwa mairi (kutadza) kukuru, asi (chitadzo) chikuru kuna Allah ndechokutadzisa vanhu kutevera nzira yaAllah, kusatenda mavari (Allah), kudzivirira kuenda ku Al-Masjid Al-Haraam (kuMakkah), uye kuburitsa vagari vemo. Uyezve Fitnah (miedzo) yakanyanya kuipa kukunda kuuraya. Uye havafi vakamira kurwa nemi kusvika vakubvisai pachitendero chenyu (Islaam) kana vachikwanisa. Uye ani nani wenyu achabva pachitendero chake obva afa ari mukusatenda, nokudaro ava mabasa avo achashaya basa pano panyika nemuhupenyu hwamangwana. Uye ava vachave vari vanhu vekumoto. Vachagara ikoko zvachose.”
